this calculates postion and angle offset values for a ray where z is implied to be 1.

either adjust the starting position or adjust the angles.

const MMat4x4 & GrProjection::GetMatrix (  )  const

returns a reference to the matrix.

update the cached projection matrix if necessary.

make sure the width and height is valid.

calculate a projection matrix based on whether or not the current configuration is orthographic or perspective.

calculate matrix components.

now build the matrix.

incorperate the near clip plane into the matrix by applying a shear on the Z axis.

make sure a valid far distance was passed in.

now build the matrix.

clear the dirty flag.

return the cached matrix.
